name: Jonathan Steele
title: Jonathan Steele | Software Engineer
about: I build mobile, cross-platform, web, and full-stack software that delivers results. With 8+ years of experience, I create scalable, high-performance apps using Android, iOS, Flutter, .NET MAUI, KMM, and modern web technologies. I collaborate with teams to align technical strategy with business goals, ship products users love, and improve processes through automation and testing.
